articles.title: Conrad sees SA20 as an 'ally' to Proteas: 'People in SA still very much in love with cricket'
articles.description: Shukri Conrad believes the SA20's success will only benefit the Proteas as they look to use that form ahead of their England ODI series.
articles.content:
• Proteas ODI caretaker coach Shukri Conrad says he sees the successful SA20 as an ally ahead of this week's England ODIs.

articles.title: Stokes named ICC Men’s Test Cricketer of the Year
articles.description: Ben Stokes is named ICC Men's Test Cricketer of the Year and Nat Sciver wins the women's ODI award
articles.content:
England won nine out of their 10 Tests under Ben Stokes' captaincy in 2022
England Test captain Ben Stokes has been named ICC Men's Test Cricketer of the Year for 2022.
